body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, physician. Massachusetts native. Son of Caleb Thayer and Mary Holbrook Thayer. Married to Marion Wallace Bridges Thayer in Mercer County, Kentucky, on December 29, 1834. Father of Mary Holbrook, Anna Palmer Thayer, John Bridges Thayer, Frances Hooker Thayer Fraser, Elizabeth Thayer, Rowan B. Thayer, Henry Norton Thayer, Sarah Ellen Thayer, Norton Thayer, William B. Thayer, Samuel P. Thayer, and Isabella Thayer. Graduate of Harvard Medical College in Cambridge, Massachusetts, in 1826. Physician in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1848. Physician in Louisville in 1858. Physician in Louisville in 1860. Physician in Louisville in 1861. Physician in Louisville in 1865.
